en.appliedForDecreeNisi: You’ve applied for a decree nisi
en.emailConfirmation: Email confirmation has been sent to {{ case.petitionerEmail }}.
en.howRespondsLink: How your {{ divorceWho }} responds
en.decreeNisiLink: Decree nisi
en.decreeAbsoluteLink: Decree absolute
en.childrenAndDivorceLink: Children and divorce
en.moneyAndPropertyLink: Money and property
en.courtWillCheck: The court will check your application and pass it to the judge. If the judge agrees there is no reason why you should not get a divorce, you’ll be sent the time, date and court in which your decree nisi will be pronounced.
en.decreeNisiGranted: After the decree nisi has been granted, you’ll have to wait 6 weeks before you can finalise your divorce by getting a decree absolute.

postDocuments.youWantToSubmitDocs: Your response said you want to submit additional documents.
postDocuments.originalDocuments: Post all your original documents to:
postDocuments.referenceNumber: You must write your reference number on each document.
postDocuments.courtCheckResponse: The court will check your response
postDocuments.responseCheckedByCourt: Your response will be checked by the court. You may be contacted again if the court needs further information. If your application passes these checks, your divorce will move on to the next stage.
postDocuments.contactUs: You can contact us if you don’t hear anything back after 4 weeks.

noPostDocuments.responseCheckedByCourt: Your response will be checked by the court. You may be contacted again if the court needs further information. If your application passes these checks, your divorce will move on to the next stage.
noPostDocuments.contactUs: You can contact us if you don’t hear anything back after 4 weeks.

clarification.contactDivorceCentre: You can contact the divorce centre if you need help. Court staff can’t give you legal advice however, and you should speak to a solicitor or legal adviser.
clarification.helpImproveLink: Please help us improve this service by leaving your feedback.

cy.appliedForDecreeNisi: Rydych wedi gwneud cais am Ddyfarniad Nisi
cy.emailConfirmation: Mae neges e-bost yn cadarnhau ein bod wedi cael eich cais wedi’i anfon i {{ case.petitionerEmail }}.
cy.howRespondsLink: Sut mae eich {{ divorceWho }} yn ymateb
cy.decreeNisiLink: Dyfarniad Nisi
cy.decreeAbsoluteLink: Dyfarniad Absoliwt
cy.childrenAndDivorceLink: Plant ac ysgariad
cy.moneyAndPropertyLink: Arian ac eiddo
cy.madeFinal: Mae eich cais am ysgariad wedi’i gwblhau
cy.courtWillCheck: Bydd y llys yn gwirio’ch cais ac yn ei basio i’r Barnwr. Os yw’r Barnwr yn cytuno nad oes unrhyw reswm pam na ddylech gael ysgariad, byddwch yn cael gwybod am yr amser, y dyddiad a’r llys lle bydd eich Dyfarniad Nisi yn cael ei gyhoeddi.
cy.decreeNisiGranted: Ar ôl i’r Dyfarniad Nisi gael ei ganiatáu, bydd rhaid ichi aros 6 wythnos cyn y gallwch wneud cais am Ddyfarniad Absoliwt i gadarnhau eich ysgariad.

postDocuments.youWantToSubmitDocs: Yn eich ymateb, mi ddywedoch eich bod eisiau cyflwyno dogfennau ychwanegol.
postDocuments.originalDocuments: Postiwch eich holl ddogfennau gwreiddiol i:
postDocuments.referenceNumber: Mae’n rhaid ichi ysgrifennu eich cyfeirnod ar bob dogfen.
postDocuments.courtCheckResponse: Bydd y llys yn gwirio eich ymateb
postDocuments.responseCheckedByCourt: Bydd eich ymateb yn cael ei wirio gan y llys. Efallai y bydd y llys yn cysylltu â chi eto os bydd angen rhagor o wybodaeth.  Os bydd eich cais yn pasio’r gwiriadau hyn, bydd eich cais am ysgariad yn symud i’r cam nesaf.
postDocuments.contactUs: Gallwch gysylltu â ni os na fyddwch wedi clywed gennym ar ôl 4 wythnos.

noPostDocuments.responseCheckedByCourt: Bydd eich ymateb yn cael ei wirio gan y llys. Efallai y bydd y llys yn cysylltu â chi eto os bydd angen rhagor o wybodaeth. Os bydd eich cais yn pasio’r gwiriadau hyn, bydd eich cais am ysgariad yn symud i’r cam nesaf.
noPostDocuments.contactUs: Gallwch gysylltu â ni os na fyddwch wedi clywed gennym ar ôl 4 wythnos.

clarification.contactDivorceCentre: Os ydych angen cymorth, gallwch gysylltu â’r ganolfan ysgaru. Fodd bynnag, ni all staff y llys roi cyngor cyfreithiol ichi, a dylech siarad â chyfreithiwr neu gynghorydd cyfreithiol.
clarification.helpImprove: Helpwch ni i wella’r gwasanaeth hwn
clarification.helpImproveLink: Helpwch ni i wella’r gwasanaeth hwn drwy roi adborth.
